Decoration.desc: A bright shiny metal valued in commerce.

Decoration.name: Diamond
Decoration.desc: A sparkling almost-translucent gemstone greatly valued by merchants and jewlers.

VisMod.desc: A everburning flame atop a small shaft of aged wood.

Container.desc: A heavy bronze chest studded with iron rivets.

Weapon.desc: A cheap bronze sword, rusted and pitted.
